item.description:
In the planning stages is a chartered bus trip to New York City complete with accommodations in a hostel. We will post details as they become available, but the tour cost will be between $175 and $200 (including 3 nights in the hostel and sandwiches/beverages on the bus). It can be less if we fill the 22 passenger bus. We must have a minimum of 12 commitments to even get the bus.

In New York, we can join in on these activities:

We Are Change, New York:
Our Lives Post 911
Facebook page
Meetup page



Other activities will be going on there and we will post links to those events as they become available.

If you haven't been to NYC before on 9/'11 weekend, you should really go some time. There is an energy there and you will see and hear and meet some of the leaders in the nation-wide 9/11 Truth movement. It's an experience not to be matched anywhere!

If you are interested in joining the tour or have any questions, please email the organizers at tour@AltOrgs.com.
item.name: "Shire Truth to Power" bus trip to NYC for 9/11 weekend
